data.name: Ghost Girl Lasling (G-rated)
data.detailed_description:
Join our Discord!


Other Premium Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1389650/Escape_Hospital/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1624020/_/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1716480/_/


Other Premium Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1745260/Girls_Cairo_Papyrus/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/811070/__Conviction/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1959530/_/


Other Premium Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1760160/Game_Theory_At_Christmas/?l=english&curator_clanid=35402408
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1523260/__Myth_of_MistLegacy/


About the Game

This is a pure love Adventure Game

Players unfold the story from Moffts' point of view.
In the dark night at the office, Mofft is gradually overwhelmed by the reality of his grave mistake.
The loss of life, everything, as if the world had abandoned this woman──Lasling stands quietly at the end of the corridor.
Though the two sides are constantly entangled by the past, they turn out to be each other's redemption.

"If that accident hadn't happened, would I still have met you?"
"Even if everything about me is falling apart, would you still stay by my side?"
"In the mountain at the back of the company, she still waits for me under the cypress tree."
"Even now, faults and mistakes are still blaming me."
"Will you be able to find happiness just by going to the far south?"

Now, let us indulge in this bitter and unforgettable love together

Game contents:
10 basic CGs, including difference more than 30 pieces
Check out heroines in different outfits
60,000 words of content
Deep and touching pure love story

data.short_description: This is a story of Lasling, a talented genius teenage girl with amazing working abilities, who becomes a ghost after an accident. The only person in the world she is visible to is Mofft, the male main protagonist. Their meeting is as if a fateful encounter and love story begins.
data.supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, German, Japanese*, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, French, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel I5/I7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

content_descriptors.notes: Description of slight nudity and physical contact
